languages.text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g}, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer uses Slash, Dash, or Kick, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

Whenever the wearer uses Slash, Dash, or Kick, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

Whenever the wearer uses Slash, Dash, or Kick, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

Whenever the wearer uses Slash, Dash, or Kick, they gain +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

Whenever the wearer uses Slash, Dash, or Kick, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者使用{g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}快刀一闪{/g}、{g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}急速冲刺{/g}或{g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}疾速猛踢{/g}时，会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于装备者的{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d}。此外，还会额外获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g}, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用快刀一闪、急速冲刺或疾速猛踢时，会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。此外，还会额外获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。

当装备者使用快刀一闪、急速冲刺或疾速猛踢时，会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于装备者的{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d}。此外，还会额外获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d}。

languages.text: При применении {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Рассечения{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Пробежки{/g} или {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Удара ногой{/g} персонаж получает +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g}, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: При применении {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Рассечения{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Пробежки{/g} или {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Удара ногой{/g} персонаж получает +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.

При применении Рассечения, Пробежки или Удара ногой персонаж получает +бонус ЛВК {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментум{/g} в количестве, равном своей {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.

При применении Рассечения, Пробежки или Удара ногой персонаж получает +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者がスラッシュ、ダッシュ、キックを使用すると、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d}、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を+{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d}追加で獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses Slash, Dash, or Kick, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が一閃、ダッシュ、キックを使用するたび、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得し、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を得る。

使用者がスラッシュ、ダッシュ、キックを使用するたび、{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d}ボーナス{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を追加で獲得し、{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador use {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Tajo{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Carrera{/g} o {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Patada{/g}, obtiene +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g}, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador use Tajo, Carrera o Patada, obtiene +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} equivalentes a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.

Cada vez que el portador use Tajo, Carrera o Patada, obtiene +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Schlitzen{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Sprinten{/g} oder {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Tritt{/g} einsetzt, erhält er +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g}, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger Schneiden, Sprinten oder Tritt einsetzt, erhält er +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} entsprechend der {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Trägers.

Immer wenn der Träger Schlitzen, Sprinten oder Tritt einsetzt, erhält er +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.

Wenn der Träger Schlitzen, Sprinten oder Tritt einsetzt, erhält er +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à la capacité {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Lacérer{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Sprint{/g} ou {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Coup de pied{/g}, il bénéficie de +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et de +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g}, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à la capacité Trancher, Sprint ou Coup de pied, il bénéficie de +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et d'une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} égale à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à la capacité Trancher, Sprint ou Coup de pied, il bénéficie de +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et d'une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} égale à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à la capacité Lacérer, Sprint ou Coup de pied, il bénéficie de +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et de +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.

languages.text: Whenever the wearer uses Slash, Dash, or Kick, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer uses Slash, Dash, or Kick, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişi, her {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Kesme{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Atılım{/g} veya {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Tekme{/g} kabiliyeti kullandığında +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g}, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
